title: [River's Rest Hall, Ship's Wheel]
description: At the far end of the room, an oversized ship's wheel conceals a wooden podium.  Hard benches placed in rows line the walls, facing a dais.  Carved seagulls rest in the rafters, and moonlight from a large round window set into the ceiling filters into the room.
